message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but $9,800 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is still a great deal for you considering the value of this product. Let's meet halfway and close this deal.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $10,250. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
